strings.INPUT_INVALID_ADDRESS: Address field must not be empty.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_CODE: Email verification code is either expired or invalid.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_CONFIRM_PASSWORD: Your password must be at least 6 characters.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_CONSENT_COLLECT: Privacy policy agreement box must be checked to continue.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_EMAIL_ADDRESS: Please enter a valid email address.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_FIRST_NAME: First name field must not be empty.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_LAST_FOUR_SSN: Last 4 SSN field must not be empty.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_LAST_NAME: Last name field must not be empty.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_NEW_PASSWORD: Your password must be at least 6 characters.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_PASSWORD: Your password must be at least 6 characters.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_USERNAME: Your username must be at least 6 characters, lowercase and cannot contain the following characters '!@#$%^*()".
strings.INPUT_INVALID_ZIP_CODE: Zip code field must not be empty.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_RESPONSE_TYPE: Media Type field must be Video or Image
strings.INPUT_INVALID_POST_TYPE: Post Type field must be Response or Content
strings.RESET_PASSWORD_CODE_IS_INVALID: Your password reset code is invalid.
strings.RESET_PASSWORD_CODE_IS_EXPIRED: Your password reset link has expired.
strings.USER_ACCOUNT_DELETED: Your account has been marked as deleted. If you think this has happened by mistake, please contact support (support@bemaverick.com).
strings.USER_ACCOUNT_REVOKED_ADMIN: Your account has been revoked due to violation of our terms of service. If you think this has happened by mistake, please contact support (support@bemaverick.com).
strings.USER_ACCOUNT_REVOKED_PARENT: Your account has been temporarily disabled by your guardian. If you would like to rejoin Maverick please speak with them to reinstate your access.
strings.USER_PASSWORD_INVALID: You have entered an invalid password.
strings.USER_DOES_NOT_EXIST: This email address is not associated with any accounts or this user does not exist.
strings.USERNAME_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE: This user name has already been used.
strings.VERIFY_ACCOUNT_CODE_IS_EXPIRED: Your verification code has expired, but you can still verify your Maverick through the Maverick home page.
strings.EMAIL_ADDRESS_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE: The email address is already in use.
strings.EMAIL_ADDRESS_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_PARENT: The parent email address is already in use by a Maverick.
